name: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition
description:
Check out the web build here! Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Gameboy Edition Web Build by Hannor Smith (itch.io)

Yashiro Nene, a first-year high-school student who loves the occult and wishes for a boyfriend, summons the Seventh and most famous Seven Mysteries, "Hanako-san of the Toilet", a girl who allegedly haunts the bathroom and can grant wishes for the right price.

Please Check "Install instructions" before playing

If you found bugs, problems or if you have suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

Original manga/anime by Aidairo 

Game by Hannor Smith
